code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SpotifyLogin=()=>{const[loginUrl,setLoginUrl]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{axios.get("http://localhost:5000/auth/login").then(res=>setLoginUrl(res.data.url)).catch(err=>console.error("❌ Auth Error:",err));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-container",children:loginUrl&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:loginUrl,className:"spotify-button",children:"Log in mit Spotify"})});};export default SpotifyLogin;
